thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Avi Furstenberg

author: Avi Furstenberg
title: Avi Furstenberg
text:
I started my law firm from Servcorp William Street. Being a start up, I didn't want to over commit with admin or to be locked into a long term lease. With Servcorp I can take advantage of their well trained staff to answer my phones and do administration on a as needed basis. I also have the advantage of being in a 5 star building without committing to anything beyond 12 months.
I checked a couple of the usual service office providers and Servcorp was by far the best.
